title.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Apr. 24, 1931. St. Cyril's Social Athletic Club Will Give a Banquet

div.bibl: Osadne Hlasy, Apr. 24, 1931. ST. CYRIL'S SOCIAL ATHLETIC CLUB WILL GIVE A BANQUET

body.p: The Young Peoples Club at St. Cyril and Methodius parish, will celebrate its fifth anniversary on April 26 with a banquet. This society, organized by Rev. Michael Buc, and which in a few years has made so much progress, has attracted wide attention all over the city. The fifth anniversary of its existence will be celebrated by an elaborate banquet, which will be attended by many leading Chicago Slovaks. Dr. Peter P. Hletko, an outstanding individual, will act as toastmaster at the banquet, which will be held at the Lyons Club at 6:30 in the evening.
